title: UP CM Yogi Adityanath asks Ayodhya civic body to exempt temples, religious shrines from water and house tax - Times Now
content:
1. UP CM Yogi Adityanath asks Ayodhya civic body to exempt temples, religious shrines from water and house tax  Times Now
  2. UP CM Yogi Adityanath exempts Ayodhya temples, other religious shrines of civic body taxes  Zee News
  3. Exempt Ayodhya temples from water and house tax, take token money instead: Yogi Adityanath  The Indian Express
  4. Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath exempts Ayodhya mutts, temples from commercial tax  Times of India
  5. ‘Chaitra Navratri’: UP CM Yogi offers prayers at Pateshwari Devi Temple in Balrampur  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Adityanath visited Ayodhya for the first time after becoming the chief minister of UP for the second term. He offered prayers at the Hanumangarhi temple and paid a visit to the construction site of Lord Ram’s temple. He asked the Ayodhya Municipal Corporation not to take commercial tax from temples and other religious shrines.
